Description:
----------------
I felt that Skyrim has a surprising lack of Hircine’s influence, considering the amount of hunting and Werebeasts there. But now Hircine will grant power and artifacts to those who hunt in his name. Find the Altar of Hircine on Solstheim (Located at the Snowclad Ruins) there you can make an offering to The Lord of The Hunt, and he may grant you his power.

Content:
------------
Create new items by making offerings of animal pelts to Hircine, the more animals you have sacrificed to Hircine the more items you can receive.

Bow of The Stag Prince: Wielder receives an increasingly powerful blessing for every 20 animals killed in Hircine’s name. (Has been moved to Hircine’s shrine at the Snowclad Ruins on Solstheim)

Summoning Arrows: Allows you to call forth a predatory beast from Hircine’s Hunting Grounds

Werewolf/Werebear Hearts: When eaten you will receive a blessing from Hircine. After 25 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Hunter’s Amulet of Speed: +40% to light armor and archery. After 25 Animals sacrificed to Hircine

Hunter’s Amulet of Strength: +40% to heavy armor and normal weapons. After 25 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Huntsman’s Helmet: Grants you the Voice of Hircine Power. After 50 Animals sacrificed to Hircine

Huntsman’s Helmet (heavy): Grants you the Hircine's Ferocity Power. After 50 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Bear Armor: (equal to elven) After 50 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Snow Bear armor: (equal to glass) After 100 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Spear of The Hunter: Wielder receives an increasingly powerful blessing for every 20 animals killed in Hircine’s name. After 100 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

Hircine’s Hunting Horn: Call upon the Lord of The Hunt to assist you in battle. After 400 Animals sacrificed to Hircine.

(Pelt Offerings can be created at a tanning rack)

Requirements:
-------------------
Skyrim
Dragonborn DLC

Change Log:
----------------
1.0 – Initial release

1.1 – Snow Bear armor added, Bear Shield added, female Bear Boots added, Animal Hearts added
